message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $85.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $82.50?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession and sell it to you for $83.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $82?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell it to you for $81.50.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $80?
